StockTemplatePages.html:
Dear Jeff,

This is a friendly payment reminder that your account is now past due.

According to our records, the following account is overdue:

Account Number

123XPWERZTU07

Due Date

02-April-20XX

Amount

$ 645.00

As your account is now overdue, a late fee of  $20.00 has been assessed.

For your convenience, you may make a payment here:

Pay by Credit Card
Pay by PayPal
 

If you have any questions or need to discuss your account, please reach out to me at 123-456-789.

Thank you for your attention to this matter and your continued business.

Sincerely,

John
